metadata.title: CVE-2017-6874 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Race condition in kernel/ucount.c in the Linux kernel through 4.10.2 allowslocal users to cause a denial of service (use-after-free and system crash)or possibly have unspecified other impact via crafted system calls thatleverage certain decrement behavior that causes incorrect interactionbetween put_ucounts and get_ucounts.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6874` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.10.0-27-generic - 4.10.0-27.30~16.04.2
linux-image-4.10.0-27-generic-lpae - 4.10.0-27.30~16.04.2
linux-image-4.10.0-27-lowlatency - 4.10.0-27.30~16.04.2
linux-image-extra-4.10.0-27-generic - 4.10.0-27.30~16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux-hwe package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.10.0-27.30~16.04.2').
